interestingFact: India is the world's largest democracy and has over 19,500 recognized languages and dialects.
The United States is home to the world’s largest economy and the iconic Grand Canyon.
Japan is known for having the oldest continuous hereditary monarchy in the world.
Brazil is the largest coffee producer in the world.
Australia is the only continent covered by a single country.
Canada has more lakes than the rest of the world combined.
China is home to the Great Wall, the longest wall in the world.
South Africa has three capital cities and is known for its biodiversity.
Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.
France is the most visited country in the world, attracting over 89 million tourists annually.
